main.description: Get moderator assignments, optionally filtered by active status, queue, moderator, or subject.

onlyActiveAssignments.description: When true, only returns active assignments where endAt is in the future.

queueIds.description: If specified, returns assignments for these queues only.

dids.description: If specified, returns assignments for these moderators only.

subject.description: If specified as a DID, returns assignments for all records and the DID. If specified as an AT-URI, returns assignments for that URI only.
